title: Happiness Is Loving Your Teacher
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, distributor
National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physically handicapped
description: A crippled substitute teacher has great difficulty controlling a class of students, especially a girl called Toni. Kept in detention, Toni walks out after verbally attacking the teacher. Next day, as the normal teacher has returned, the substitute teacher does not have to face the class. A repentant Toni rings him up and makes them both feel better. Stars Marina Dimakopoulos, Martin Kevin. Written by Mariette Cook, John N. Smith.
